ygData.subject: RE: [rest-discuss] SOAP; where's the REST?
ygData.msgSnippet: Nice piece.  I liked the RPC/virus analogy. 8-) I suppose that we ll just have to agree to disagree on the value of XML over existing, working protocols.  That
